Text.Page:
We're studying slight changes in Balder's Patternâ€”the glyphs and lines that appear in the daytime sky. But we can't do a proper job unless we can study the pattern at the same time in different places.

I'm supposed to have researchers in both the {@Rgn:30009$$Upper Archive} and the {@Rgn:30008$$Lower Archive}, but their reports are late.

Can you drop by and tell them to hurry with the report? Check with {@LinkCreature:230#1026$$Meterok} first. He's somewhere in the upper archive.

Report?

I can't send my report until I've heard from {@LinkCreature:230#1020$$Ronush}, but his observation isn't finished. So typical!

{@LinkCreature:230#1020$$Ronush} has my data as well, so you can go there and kill two birds with one stone.

Collecting for the Veteran Aid Society? I gave last month...

Sorry, my mistake. Sestena sent you? Of course she did. Impatient, isn't she?

We have to time the changes in Balder's Pattern perfectly, but {@LinkCreature:230#1026$$Meterok}'s notes are poorly organized, which is slowing me down.

You'll have to wait for my observation to finish. While you're waiting, would you like an odd job in exchange for gold?
